channel.title: Downloading music
channel.description:
I'm trying to download the songs from [url=http://www.mtv.com/music/the_leak/sum_41/underclass_hero/]here[/url], but it has proven harder than previously thought (Especially since the songs are played through a pop-up windows media player.). Any suggestions?
More info: In the html (invalid btw. MTV should get better Web Devs...), the song links are[code] <a onclick="launchVideo('track=01&type=listeningparty&paid=960668&albumid=1551910&xmlFile=/music/the_leak/sum_41/underclass_hero/album.xml&format=win'); return false;" href="#">[/code] with each track being track=01, track=02, etc.
and the # in href="#" means what?

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Blogmusik only has one out of the 14 songs though.

EDIT: I found a way to get it on my comp. Only problem is that it is a single file called “playlist2” instead of individual files…

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“3.65 kilos, post:11, topic:124254”]I know. It’s like a whole page created in Javascript.

And for anyone that cares, the direct link to the music would be:
http://www.mtv.com/sitewide/apps/mediaplayer/index.jhtml?track=02&type=listeningparty&paid=960668&albumid=1551910&xmlFile=/music/the_leak/sum_41/underclass_hero/album.xml&format=win&style_sheet1=/sitewide/apps/mediaplayer/css/sponsor_header/leak_cingular.jhtml&section_4=&refURL=/music/the_leak/sum_41/underclass_hero/&adPN=&section_3=underclass_hero&videotitle=Underclass+Hero&section_0=music&section_1=the_leak&section_2=sum_41[/quote]

Pretty big link…

Well anyways you can also try downloading from Blogmusik.net

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“3.65 kilos, post:8, topic:124254”]Where’s the fun in limewire?

Besides, the CD isn’t even released yet so I doubt all the songs would be obtainable so easily.[/quote]
OO, okay lol. <3 Fallout.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Here’s some more to work with:

[code]
Underclass Hero

s41_track_02_64k.wma

Speak Of The Devil
s41_track_03_64k.wma

s41_track_04_64k.wma

s41_track_05_64k.wma

Ma Poubelle
s41_track_06_64k.wma

s41_track_07_64k.wma

The Jester
s41_track_08_64k.wma
With Me
s41_track_09_64k.wma

Pull The Curtain
s41_track_10_64k.wma

King Of Contradiction
s41_track_11_64k.wma

Best Of Me
s41_track_12_64k.wma

Confusion And Frustration In Modern Times
s41_track_13_64k.wma

So Long Goodbye
s41_track_14_64k.wma[/code]

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

That’s interesting to know…thanks goatee. I learned something.

And I know they are trying to make it where you can’t download them, that’s why I’m trying! It’s like a challenge.

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“3.65 kilos, post:1, topic:124254”]I’m trying to download the songs from here, but it has proven harder than previously thought (Especially since the songs are played through a pop-up windows media player.). Any suggestions?

More info: In the html (invalid btw. MTV should get better Web Devs…), the song links are <a onclick="launchVideo('track=01&type=listeningparty&paid=960668&albumid=1551910&xmlFile=/music/the_leak/sum_41/underclass_hero/album.xml&format=win'); return false;" href="#">
with each track being track=01, track=02, etc.

and the # in href="#" means what?[/quote]

Well the point is so you can’t download them…

item.title: Downloading music
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

" href="#" " means it’s linking to itself… like “#” means nothing.

Read full topic
